title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout in Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, instead of the second row remaining, it is also removed from the layout.
EB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row should be deleted while the second row should remain unaffected.
SR:
1. Open the Coolbar.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the second row remains intact.
